name: keycuts
description: A modern keyboard event library for managing keyboard shortcuts.
author: Kai Schlamp

scripts.build: npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run webpack && npm run docs
scripts.clean: npm run clean:coverage && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:docs
scripts.docs: npm run clean:docs && documentation build src/** -f html -o docs/api
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git push origin master && npm publish
scripts.deploy:patch: npm version patch && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && npm run deploy
scripts.webpack: npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack:dev && npm run webpack:prod
